CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 8, 1962, pg. 21 reads: " "Miss Crazy Pants" - The above young ladies will be contestants for "Miss Crazy Pants Night" at the Loendi Club, on Wednesday, Sept. 12.  These young "Foxes" will represent local taverns in the city.  Reading from left to right are Evelyn Gregory, "Miss North Side"; Phyllis Moorman, "Miss Chase Lounge"; Jean Wild, "Miss Crawford Grill"; Sandra Williamson, "Miss New Frontier," and Barbara McMilan, "Miss Ebony Lounge."  This will be one of the special features that will be held during Loendi Week, starting Sunday, Sept 9, and ending Saturday, Sept. 15.  Each night will have something swinging-so plan to attend one or all of the nights.  Bring a friend, bring a group, but plan to attend Loendi Week."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of "Miss Crazy Pants Night" contestant Jean Wild, modeling dark bathing suit, posed in front of light colored curtain in Loendi Club
